qas.question: When did China announce service plans for the BeiDou system?
What was the accuracy range that China promised to offer in 2008 with the BeiDou system?
What was the timing and speed that China promised to offer in 2008 with the BeiDou system?

answers.text: timing of 0.2 microseconds, and speed of 0.2 meters/second

qas.question: China would offer a closed service with an accuracy of what?

plausible_answers.text: open service with an accuracy of 10 meters, timing of 0.2 microseconds, and speed of 0.2 meters/second

qas.question: Japan promised a timing speed of what with its open service?
Japan promised a speed of what with its open service?

plausible_answers.text: open service with an accuracy of 10 meters, timing of 0.2 microseconds, and speed of 0.2 meters/second
